title: Woahhh, those Kat changes
body:
Talking with a friend who was the rank 1 Kat on LoLskill while they still played often.
I've never heard someone be so angry over a video game. 
Not sure how well these Kat changes are gonna be received...

https://twitter.com/ricklessabandon/status/557335117190815746/photo/1

replies.body: It's like they want her to be an AD assassin now.

> [{quoted}](name=Destaice,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oGLkwfN9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-20T05:47:37.635+0000)
>
> It's like they want her to be an AD assassin now.

Well yes, that's the new mid lane meta.

dont play kat so is this bad?
will i never have to worry bout her again? 
pls tell me yes

I'm confused, her Q would be so bad if she goes AD... 
shunpo resets autos and her W does super AD scaling so I guess they want her to go AD?
but they nerfed her AS...
and shunpo does no damage now: obvious nerf... but she's more like yasuo but not as forgiving since she can misclick and end up with 15 sec CDs?
I'm getting mixed messages like one of those weird dates...
this kat feels like urgot... if urgot was a melee assassin. (mix matched abilities that is dissynergized)

I'm thinking, due to the fact that they nerfed her attack speed but buffed her attack delay, that they want her to build a Lichbane and proc it using the autoattack reset on her Shunpo. I'm not quite sure about the W change, but it probably won't be too much worse than Akali's E if you build a Gunblade. I wouldn't really build any other AD on her though.

The big problem here is that Lichbane doesn't apply spell vamp nor life steal, and Kat won't have any single target spells after they remove the damage on her shunpo, so the only thing that'll fully proc spell vamp for her is the mark on her Q. I'm not sure if that makes Gunblade worth it, even with the W nerf.

To be honest, if they're going to go through with this, they'll have to change her W and R to do physical damage otherwise she'll just be another WW and Evelynn where they build AD and still end up doing more magic damage than physical. Void Staff on an AD champ would be a little awkward.
That's like a complete role change.
Eve had the same thing when her E was changed.
That source is not legitimate. Sorry but until you have an actual real source I consider these non-existent.

These changes are stupid. Her main damaging tool in lane will do close to no damage if you don't proc the mark, her W is worse at lvl 9, and shunpo does no damage
If any of those changes were to be real I hope it would be Shunpo being 15s at all ranks.
cool now i can finally build Bloodthirster on her.
